# cato_group (Data Source)

The `cato_group` data source fetches information about a specific group by ID or name. Groups can contain various member types including sites, hosts, network ranges, and more.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Group ID (computed when using name lookup)
- `name` (String) Group name (use instead of ID for name-based lookup)

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Group description
- `members` (Attributes Set) List of group members with name, id, and type (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--members))

<a id="nestedatt--members"></a>
### Nested Schema for `members`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) Member ID
- `name` (String) Member name
- `type` (String) Member type: SITE, HOST, NETWORK_INTERFACE, GLOBAL_IP_RANGE, FLOATING_SUBNET, SITE_NETWORK_SUBNET, USER, USERS_GROUP, SYSTEM_GROUP
